eboard.name: Aran churaca
eboard.description: Leads chapter initiatives and represents SHPE FAU at national conferences. Passionate about empowering Hispanic engineers and creating opportunities for professional growth.

eboard.name: Maria Gonzalez
eboard.description: Oversees internal operations and member engagement. Focuses on creating inclusive programming and supporting academic success for all members.

eboard.name: Carlos Mendez
eboard.description: Manages chapter finances and budget planning. Ensures sustainable growth and responsible resource allocation for all SHPE FAU activities.

eboard.name: Sofia Herrera
eboard.description: Handles communications and documentation. Keeps members informed about opportunities and maintains records of chapter activities and achievements.

eboard.name: Diego Silva
eboard.description: Organizes career development workshops and networking events. Connects members with industry professionals and internship opportunities.

eboard.name: Isabella Torres
eboard.description: Leads community service initiatives and STEM outreach programs. Builds partnerships with local schools and organizations to promote engineering education.

eboard.name: Alejandro Ruiz
eboard.description: Coordinates tutoring programs and study groups. Supports members' academic success through peer mentoring and resource sharing.

eboard.name: Valentina Castro
eboard.description: Manages SHPE FAU's online presence and digital communications. Creates engaging content to showcase member achievements and chapter activities.
